alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 16 at 1:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 122 PM MST, Gauge reports and officials indicate increased flow on streams and washes including Gilson Wash, Warm Springs crossing, Ash Creek and San Carlos River. Flooding may already be occurring in these areas. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Gila County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
